remarks:
A deduction from a biconditional, related to modus ponens.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) 

---

 A deduction from a biconditional, related to modus ponens.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
mpbid.min $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
mpbid.maj $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
mpbid $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
